dc:title: Friday Night Meeting
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Notes of a Friday night meeting with artist Fritz Eichenberg on modern art, much of which he sees as junk and dehumanizing. Eichenberg says going back to crafts will restore creativeness.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 767 1960-07-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
